content: दुष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [दुष्-क्त] {@--1@} Spoiled, damaged, injured, ruined. {@--2@} Defiled, tainted, violated, sullied. {@--3@} Depraved, corrupted {@--4@} Vicious, wicked; as दुष्टवृषः. {@--5@} Guilty, culpable. {@--6@} Low, vile. {@--7@} Faulty or defective, as a हेतु in logic. {@--8@} Painful. {@--9@} Worthless. --ष्टा {@--1@} A bad or unchaste woman. {@--2@} A harlot. --ष्टं {@--1@} Sin, crime, guilt. {@--2@} A kind of leprosy.
